thread.section_title: TransferWise Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of transferwise.com | 23 of 1820
thread.title: R S

author: R S
title: R S
text:
"TransferWise" are a friendly easy-to-use and slick service to transfer monies between accounts.
The whole process is smooth and slick and there is no time-wasting either. This greatly diminishes any angst that may be lingering when dealing with such a delicate matter as transferring money overseas.
I had to communicate with them on one occasion choosing their live-chat service and was impressed with the speed and quality of information imparted.
It is such a big relief that I have found such an organisation of this kind for any future transactions.
